title: A Spawn of Rammstein â€“ Introducing: Emigrate
excerpt: I’m not sure what to call Emigrate. Is it German rock? or is it American? I say this because, although Emigrate was recently founded by Rammstein’s lead guitarist, Richard Z Kruspe, it was founded in America. The other members are also American. The vocals are in English, but they’re managed by Pilgrim Management (the same … more →
